meanings.sent1: The new student seemed unfriendlier than the others in the class.
meanings.sent2: The cat became unfriendlier towards strangers after the move.
meanings.sent3: The unfriendlier dog barked at its own reflection in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds grew darker and unfriendlier as the day went on.
meanings.sent5: The unfriendlier atmosphere in the room made everyone uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: Showing or suggesting a lack of friendliness.
meanings.sent1: Her unfriendlier tone made it clear she was upset.
meanings.sent2: The unfriendlier expression on his face hinted at his annoyance.
meanings.sent3: The unfriendlier cat refused to play with the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The unfriendlier sky warned of an approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The unfriendlier look in her eyes sent a chill down his spine.
